definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Friends of the museum were permitted to buy pieces that were de-accessioned.
sentences.chinese: 馆友们也被容许购买博物馆出售的馆藏。

sentences.english: There are so many works of art that some of them must be stored away.
sentences.chinese: 罗浮宫的馆藏众多，以致于有些艺术品必须收存起来。

sentences.english: I can't wait to visit Fuping again to see the new museums and all the new work in the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我急不可待的想再次看到新馆群和其所馆藏的新作品。

sentences.english: Dewey can sort large collections into more specific groups than BISAC can.
sentences.chinese: 杜威比起BISAC能够更详细的区分大量馆藏。

sentences.english: Friends of the museum are permitted to buy pieces that are de- accession.
sentences.chinese: 馆友们也被容许购买博物馆出售的馆藏。

sentences.english: Friends of the museum are permitted to buy pieces that are deaccessioned.
sentences.chinese: 馆友们也被容许购买博物馆出售的馆藏。

sentences.english: The insufficiency of funds is an important factor which hinders the construction of local university library collection.
sentences.chinese: 经费不足是阻碍地方高校图书馆馆藏建设的重要因素。

sentences.english: Friends of the museum were permitted to buy pieces that were deaccessioned.
sentences.chinese: 馆友们也被容许购买博物馆出售的馆藏。

sentences.english: We changed the locations by call number.
sentences.chinese: 我们根据索书号改变了书的馆藏位置。

sentences.english: This paper introduce how to utilize the check machine library collection check by combining practice closely.
sentences.chinese: 密切结合实践，介绍如何利用盘点机辅助馆藏清点。

sentences.english: At the same time, reading rooms of special collections are built.
sentences.chinese: 在建设数字特色馆藏的同时，还建立了特藏阅览室。

sentences.english: However, the British Museum is forbidden by law from giving up any part of its collection.
sentences.chinese: 然而，英国法律禁止大英博物馆交出任何馆藏品。
北京故宫博物院馆藏珍品。

sentences.english: All of this leads me to wonder about the future of collections at mylibrary.
sentences.chinese: 所有这一切都让我开始怀疑我们图书馆馆藏的未来。

sentences.english: Use online resources to build your proposal and your collection.
sentences.chinese: 使用网络资源帮助你提出建议，购买馆藏。

sentences.english: The library has a huge collection of historical documents.
sentences.chinese: 这间图书馆有大量历史文献馆藏。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei
to record/to put down in writing
